name: Graveyard Cat
description:
Play as a cat and restore tombstones. Get to know some of the local residents.

Controls

Interact/select - F (Keyboard), A (Gamepad)

Movement - WASD (Keyboard), Left Stick (Gamepad)

Menu - Esc (Keyboard), Start (Gamepad)

Cancel - Q(Keyboard), B (Gamepad)

UI Navigation - D-Pad (gamepad)

The game can also be played on android. We are still waiting on the app review to be completed.

It will be available at:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DefaultCompany.GDTVGameJam2D

In the meantime, you can download the apk from the downloads listed on this page.
